alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 10:40AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at La Grange LD. Illinois River at Meredosia. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Meredosia. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, City of Meredosia plugs storm sewer outlets. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue rising to 17.7 feet Tuesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Illinois River Meredosia 17.0 16.4 Wed 10 am 16.8 17.1 17.3 17.5 17.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
